name: Epitaph (itch) (galatsu)
description:
TW: Ommetaphobia

Epitaph is a robust clone of the kind of battle system found in Inscryption, featuring custom cards, bespoke art, and a twist of the weird.

Wagering your life against a mysterious foe, can you save your soul? Or will you become just another Epitaph?

[ Updated version. ]
